data.title: Karim Mawlawi - Business Solutions Consultant
data.meta_description: View the professional profile of Karim Mawlawi, a seasoned Business Solutions Consultant with over 20 years, 4 Months of experience, on Bayt.com.
data.text:
Business Solutions Consultant at Axios Systems

United Arab Emirates

My current job since February 2008

• Develop business plans and handle sales/presales channels, and markets for Axios assyst IT service management solution

• Present, design and architect solutions for the Axios assyst

• Manage channel partners and direct sales opportunities

Technical Manager at Ejada FZ LLC

United Arab Emirates

February 2007 to January 2008

• Develop business plans and handled sales/presales channels, and markets for BMC Business Service Management and Strohl Business Continuity & Disaster Recovery Systems

• Design and architect solutions for the BMC products and develop project plans and solution pricing

• Manage presales and professional services teams

Business Service Management Consultant at Al Moammar Information Systems

Saudi Arabia - Riyadh

June 2004 to January 2007

• Developed business plans and handled sales/presales channels, and markets for BMC Business Service Management, primarily presenting services to private organizations, banking and government sectors

• Defined/executed marketing and sales plans for potential customers and presented Remedy IT Service Management (ITSM), Marimba and ServiceWare solutions based upon business strategy formulation and understanding the prospect needs and requirements

• Managed teams in different projects insuring a quality service delivery and a customer orientation environment

• Developed presales technical proposals for the ITSM Suit and Marimba, project plans, end user documentation and training material

• Handled solutions pricing setting profit margins and resource allocation
